content.detailedDescription:
I know the exact time because we always leave to go dancing at 6:45 pm, but i don't know if it was mdt or what--i can not keep the time zone straight, but it was before it changed to the time we have now)i am not sure which tuesday it was but before march and sometime in  middle february. my friend and i were getting in the pickup to go dancing.  as we walked to the pickup, i remarked how bright the stars were and how clear the sky was and no wind (which we had been having).  we saw the evening star in the west and as i was looking at the clear sky, i looked around the sky and in the southeast i saw a circle of lights with maybe 6 or 8 lights.  they appeared as if i was looking at the stars very far away but in perfect cirle. in front of the circle, or (hovering above the formation, it is hard for me to explain) was a formation with 7 objects in the shape of a v. as i saw them i said "look at that".  my friend said "what" and i said "those things flying".  they were in such perfect formation and my friend couldn't see what i was pointing at, at first, and by the time he looked up and saw them they had moved from the southeast to the north west and just about as he located them they were out of sight. he said "those are geese" because it resembled their formation and shape, only the wings didn't "flap".  i said "geese don't fly at night".  by the time of those few sentences, the formation was gone out of sight. it didn't seem they flew out of sight as much as if they just disappeared heading in the northwest still in perfect formation. they didin't appear to be as far up in the sky as the circle, but they were as high as a jet would fly .  the circle didn't move to the northwest with them, unless it was so high it was out of sight of my natural eye.  i looked back to see the circle and to see if i had imagined things, but my friend said let's go so i got in the pickup and we left.  he doesn't like things like that,but i said "it seems so eerie because all those things didn't make even one sound".  he agreed that it was eerie but wanted to dropped the subject.  it only lasted the length of time it took us to say the above sentences.  the sky was so clear that evening.
i didn't report this earlier because i couldn't find any place on the internet, until i read the article about the cow in our local paper today, march 25, 2009, and saw this website.  i didn't report it to the local paper.  i do not like publicity, but do know what i saw.  i also saw a ufo in the fall of 1948 in nebraska, but it didi't look like this.
content.summary: 7 objects  flying as geese would fly; in perfect  formation; no sound/a circle of lights seemed to be much higher; did not follow formation.

content.detailedDescription: I was flying from chicago to orlando, fl on march 14, 2009 on air tran flight 823.  during our final descent i noticed  a small, dull silver colored spherical orb in the air below the plane on the left.  the object caught my eye because of its gray color and perfectly round shape.  the object was at less than half the altitude of the plane.  i noticed it, saw it disappear behind the wing and reappear on the other side before leaving my range of sight out of the plane's window.  the object was moving in the opposite direction of our plane, slightly faster than our plane's speed.  at first i thought it was a power line with some sort of identifying object, but saw no other orbs or power lines.  my next thought was that it was a bird, but i later saw a bird flying below our plane.  the bird was traveling in the same direction and at approximately the same altitude as the object and it was easily recognizable as a bird.  after the sighting i tried to explain to myself what i had seen, but no explanation came to mind.  later seeing a bird which looked very different confirmed that i had seen something unusual and unexplainable.  the object was definitely in the air and looked unusual enough for me to want to report it.
content.summary: Saw small spherical orb-shaped ufo while coming in for landing at orlando international airport on air tran flight 823

content.detailedDescription:
Around 8pm, i was outside chatting with a friend in my driveway.  i observed a bright object moving low across the sky.  it was a reddish-white colored light and at one point became extremely bright (mostly white) while continuing along its trajectory.  there was no indication of any strobes or beacons as i normally would associate with aircraft.  it was moving away from us in a nw direction.

no sound whatsoever could be heard and the brightness i observed could only be compared to a very close plane approaching us with its landing lights on.  this object however was traveling away from us and away from any nearby airports.  i estimate initial brightness at 5x the brightest star or planet in the sky and peak brightness at about 10x.  the object disappeared from view beyond the horizon/tree line heading in a nw direction.  it was moving rapidly enough to cover a large swath of sky in less than a minute.  impossible to estimate the exact distance from our vantage point, but i would figure 5 miles north of us, give or take.

i felt as though i had just watched an event in progress that was difficult to explain or compare to any other aircraft i had seen up to this point.  i scanned the sky and noticed a plane that was heading south to north in same general direction as where we lost sight of the object.  the plane's altitude was 2-3 times higher in the sky, it was only noticeable by the tell-tale strobe-beacon light and seemed to be traveling no more than 1/4 of the speed of the first object we had observed.
content.summary: Star-like, color-changing, low-flying object, moving quickly across the horizon.

content.detailedDescription: I was at the park last night directly behind the east norriton township building walking my dog as i do 4-5 nights a week.  it was about 10 pm.  its a great spot to look at the stars and all of the planes flying by because there is very little artificial light at night.  as i watched my dog run around and play, i saw two bright lights in the distance which looked stationary - almost like 2 towers with bright lights atop them.  it seemed odd to me that i had never noticed them before in the 2+ years i had been walking my dog there at night.  as i stared at them, i noticed they had been moving, but very slowly.  i was transfixed on them because they seemed unlike any plane i'd ever seen.  finally, after about 10 minutes, they were directly over me and flying at a very low altitude, and at a very low speed.  they had lights on them that went from what looked like blinking white lights which would change to blinking red and blue lights and then occasionally a non-blinking bright white light.  at first their were only 2.  and then 2 more followed.  i started too look all around me and to the east i could see 3 more.  all flying low, slow, and changing light displays.  in all, i saw a total of 10-12 of them.  another thing is that they generally flew in pairs and very close to each other, much closer than normal planes do.  lastly, they made no noise until they were directly above me, i could hear the faintest rumble of an engine.  other than that, they were earily silent. after watching and watching, eventually they all just flew away and i couldnt see what happened.  after about an hour, the display was over and i still have no clue what i witnessed.  as i was watching, i was confused mainly.  i just could not for the life of me figure out what i was seeing.  the funny part is that the east norriton township building also house the police station.  i easily could have gone in to tell them but i didnt want to cause a stir if i turned out to be overreacting.  i apologize if this is poorly written.  im at work and have a very busy day, but had to tell someone this!
content.summary: Several slow moving objects.

content.detailedDescription:
About 9pm last night march 24, 2009 i was sitting on the back patio of our house petting the dog and watching the sky. we live almost under one of the main flight paths for san antonio airport. my patio faces approximately northwest. almost all of the air traffic is on a north/south trajectory. you can clearly see all faa marking lights and landing lights as the aircraft are usually low in altitude. 
about 09:08pm a bright gold flash caught my eye to the west and i immediately focused my attention there. i saw a very bright sold gold orb moving from the west to east at a very fast pace. it had no tail and was very well defined. it did not fade in or out, but simply appeared for about a second and disappeared. i got up and moved towards the west side of my patio to make sure that a small tree had not obscured the view, but it was not there. in about thirty second another bright gold object appeared just below where i had seen the first one. this one had a bright tail behind it that appeared to be debris like a sparkler would give off. it too disappeared in about a second. i yelled at my wife that we might be having a comet show. after watching the sky for another 30 minutes and not seeing anything else unusual i thought more about it and since the sky was very overcast i began to doubt that the two object could have been shooting stars because of the overcast and the fact that they were on a flat trajectory and not descending. watching planes coming in for a landing i could see that their lights were somewhat diminished in brightness until they got lower and closer which would indicate that the cloud cover was fairly low. please see the attached picture that i took this morning to get an idea of the position on the horizon and the distance they covered. 
i would like to mention that i saw something similar back in about october 2008 but the gold object traveled along the western horizon just above and along the entire roof line of our house. it only took it about three second to do this. i didn���t think much of it at the time as the sun was just setting and the sky was clear. the one odd thing is that it appeared in a bright flash and then instantly got smaller before it went above the roof line. i just thought it was a shooting star as well. i am a long time ufo buff and i read your daily reports and look at the pictures. i am usually very skeptical of what most people would like to call a ufo. i would very much like to know if anyone else saw these objects above san antonio last night.
content.summary: Gold orbs over san antonio.

content.detailedDescription: This is in reference to case # 16234 - san bernardino siting. i believe i have witnessed what you have. once in minnesota in 2001 with approximately 20 of the objects and once in missouri in 2005 with 2 objects. both days where bright sunny days. the objects where white and seemed to be gliding, very fast and in formation. i too did not see wings flapping but was expecting too which is what made it so peculiar. it was very strange and as hard as i tried to convince myself that they were birds, pelicans possibly, there was just no way. they were far to high, the formation was spread too far and the objects were moving in perfect unison. it is difficult to explain.
content.summary: Reference to case #16234 - bird like objects.

content.detailedDescription: I was out side of my work having a smoke and start to observe the beautifull blue sky (north east) and spotted couple of jet liners flying toward east. i can see their trail clearly and suddenly i spotted a swarm of birds like things (18-25) flew west and they immediatley turn and flew east, as they turn east some grouped like a v shape like the birds fly while several flew themselves (about 80 dig north east). but the craziest thing about the whole thing was i never saw any wings flapping they were same exact color (whitish grey) and they were way higher up obve those air liners i was observing. is it possible that these were birds? i could'nt find any type of birds that can fly that high on the internet. can someone please expalin!
content.summary: Formation like birds.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from work and saw out of the corner of my eye a low flying craft.  i turned my head quick to look at it thinking that i was going to see a plane crash and noticed that it was not an airplane.  i was just east of walmart on highway 98 in gulf breeze, florida.  the craft was hovering just above the trees maybe 50 yards away from me.  i was so startled that i had to pull off the side of the road.  i watched it for about 3 minutes.  it had eight lights.  they were shaped like a diamond.  four lights made up a small diamond that was surrounded by four more lights that made up a bigger diamond around it.  it just hovered there in the sky not moving.  i also noticed that it was not making any noise.  i had the windows down in my car and i could not hear anything.  after a few minutes it just diappeared.  i thought that maybe i had blinked and missed it, but i could not find it anywhere in the sky.  i know that it was definitely not any kind of airplane that i had ever seen or heard of before.
content.summary: Saw a diamond shape craft with 8 lights hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving to my home at the time in covington from my now fiancee's house at that time in slidell. i was listening to a robert johnson record and smoking cigarettes to pass the time while driving. my sunroof in my car was open and i remember looking up through it and blowing smoke through the sunroof. as i was looking out of the sunroof i passed underneath an overpass and just as i could see the sky, a bright light appeared instantly and i felt a strange rush of energy in my body. i don't remember what color the light was because multiple colors followed. a series of lights appeared one by one and then together. each time they grew brighter and more colorful. i even remember thinking that i had never seen some of the colors that were appearing and i could not look away. my eyes were stuck on it. then, a large ball of white/off-white light appeared and stayed for a minute or so and vanished.

i am not sure, but they seemed rather close, maybe 30 feet or so above the car. i did'nt see a craft bit i felt like something was there. the air became really heavy and i had the feeling that something was there other than bright lights.

afterwards, my ears were buzzing and i realized that my car was stopped on the side of the interstate. oddly, it was still in drive but not moving. i felt a strange mixture of fear, peace, and amazement. i sat for a while to collect my thoughts and called my fiancee to tell her what had happened. she did'nt believe me and this upset me because what i was feeling was so strong and tangible. i pressed the gas pedal and my car began moving with no trouble and went home. it was extremely difficult to sleep that night. i was so excited about my sighting and the fact that it was such an intense one at that.
content.summary: A series of bright colored lights flashing very close to the ground, stopping my moving car.

content.detailedDescription:
my wife and i were going to columbia sc,to look at homes. it was around 7 to 8 pm. we saw a glare to our right at s/w. we thought it was the setting sun reflecting on a stainless plane. all of a sudden a sphere was to our right. it was about 300to400 feet up. sitting there at what seemed like 2to4 minutes.It then shot across the road to our left at a little bit higher level. sitting there for a short time [15 to 30seconds] it disappered in a flash, we did not see where it went because it was gone in an instant. 

 i am making a drawing and will mail later. thanks {pid}
content.summary: Round w/points size of beach ball/then doubled color was a burnt red.

content.detailedDescription: Coming home from pensacola beach, i spotted three lights in a row.  the object seemed to turn and then it appeared to be triangular with more lights.  the lights would stay on 3-4 seconds and then disappear.  the object did not appear to be moving, so i assumed it was not an airplane or helicopter.  i kept watching as we were driving accross the bridge and the object did not appear to move.  i wached the lights go on and off in the same pattern at least 4-5 times. as we reached the end of the bridge and turned on hwy 98 toward navarre, we looked to our left and the same lights and pattern appeared on the left side of hwy 98 totally opposite the side of the road we had seen it before.  this time it seemed to be moving back accross hwy 98 back toward the water.  it moved across, in front, above us, and lower behind trees.  we were in a jeep with no windows, but heard no noise what so ever.  after arriving home in midway, we looked in the sky and could see what seemed to be puffy small smoke-like clouds above us, but the rest of the sky was totally clear. shortly afterwards we saw and heard several military helicopters going toward where we last saw the object. we were totally amazed as we continued to rule out the possibility of planes, copters, flares, ect.  we came to the conclusion there was nothing we knew that could exhibit such unusual patterns of movement and light display.
content.summary: Sighted object coming home from pensacola beach going home in gulf breeze.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my backyard with my nightvision looking at the stars when isaw an object come into my erea i mean the spot i could see with the nightvision and it was like a star but it moved forward backward cameback and then shot upward and kind of curved towards the right then it went out of my plain of view, and that wasnt the first time with the nightvision i have seen weird objects my wife was also with me    what am i seeing
content.summary: Looking in sky/night vision.

content.detailedDescription: I was bringing my daughter in the house when over head i saw what i thought was a bird but then realized this was higher up and left a contrail. it took me about 2 minutes to get the camera but the contrail was a tight spiral with rings by the time the camera turned on the trail had started to fade here are the photos.
content.summary: Saw something fly very fast over my head object left a trail.

content.detailedDescription: Early on the morning of march 19, 2009, i was walking my dog down the street. as i looked ahead, i saw what appeared to be a plane taking off, although there are no airports in my area. it seemed to be flying at a height of about 250 feet, in an eastward direction at about a 30 degree angle. it seemed strange, but i didn't pay much attention to it until i saw it make a dramatic climb in altitude. it went from flying at a 30 degree angle to flying at about an 80 degree angle. it was practically flying vertically, and it was climbing altitude rapidly. after about 5 seconds of flying, it had probably risen to a height of about 600 feet. then, it gradually began to level - off. it took about 3 seconds for it to get level again. once it was level, it slowly turned left and headed north towards me and my dog. it banked, and its triangular shape became apparent. unsure of what this thing was, i started to run back home to tell the rest of my family, so that they could come and see it. but, as it flew closer, i decided to stay and watch it, because it was so fascinating. it was probably flying at around 70 miles per hour. as it approached and passed overhead, i was able to see its underside. it was clearly a triangular aircraft. from my point of view, the object was about the size of a baseball, and all three sides of the object were the same length. it was black or gray in color, and it had one small white light on each corner (which made 3 white lights altogether), and one small red light in the center. it continued to fly north, and i watched it until it disappeared behind the trees. throughout the entire flight, it made a low whistling noise, similar to a quiet "whoooosh" sound. it sounded similar to the sound that an airplane makes as it moves through the air, but i didn't hear the humming of an engine. the entire experience probably lasted about 1 minute.
content.summary: Triangular aircraft flies extremely low, then flies vertically, then flies directly over me.

content.detailedDescription: My first experience was in the fall of 1994.My girlfriend now my wife and i were driving leaving deer park texas on rail road ave.Which is a feeder road that runs along hwy 225 going to houston.It was a cool night about 9:30.My wife was looking threw the glove box when i witnessed a streak of light shoot from over shell refinery from right to left and crossed our path,.From my drivers seat looking out the windsheild it was a 3 inch streak with a yellowish red tint.I immediatly said "what the hell",that was when my wife looked up, at that momment it seperated into 3 perfect spheres of light,same size of the streak.Then disappeard to nothing.We couldnt believe what we saw,and havent seen that particuler object again.The thing that really gets me is this object was solid light,no sparks no fire no smoke,just light.And what got me to contact mufon is that ive started hearing simular reports from around the world my intrest is peaked.We are believers and know we are not alone. thank you for your time-r.S.
content.summary: Witnessed a reddish amber streak of light that then turned to 3 spheres that vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
To the poster of this report, i was hoping you could tell what the black tower like objects are in your pictures. are they towers? since you said it was a volcano i thought that would be a strange place to put t.V. or radio towers unless it's a dormant volcano which obviously it is. 

the reason i am interested is my son took a picture not long ago and it looks very much like the black lines in your picture except we were on a airplane at 33k feet over texas.
content.summary: This is in reference to submitter file 16192 2009-03-23, 2008-08-03. ufo over quezaltepec volcano, san salvador, el salvador.

content.detailedDescription: witness was in her bedroom and noticed a very bright light outside. at first she thought it might be a helicopter, but it was much brighter than that. and she saw no structure, just the light. it was hovering just below the level of the treetops about two blocks away. it was less than half the diameter of the moon, almost round, but with a little of the left side cut off and a very little going down, rather like a drawing of half a stylized heart, or like the capital letter d. it was much brighter than the moon, brighter than any street light. the glow from it was wider than her outstretched hand, held at arm's length. it was not moving. she looked away for just a second, and when she looked again she couldn't see it. she went to the dining room window to see if she could see it from a different angle from there, but she couldn't. then she heard a roar or rumble, sort of like a jet, but louder and lower in pitch, going over the apartment building. she saw it for less than a minute altogether.
content.summary: Very bright light seen through window for a minute

content.detailedDescription:
Object heading towards earth causing a large vapor trail. i was heading due east on i-80 at eastfork road and i could see what looked like a very large vapor trail descending back to earth. it had a tear drop shape with a black center extending up half way thru the vapor trail. it appeared to be above the thunder head cloud that was approximately 20,000-30000 feet high and the object descended behind the thunder head. i can't be totally sure about it's dimensions but the size and altitude of the object would have made it larger than most airliners that i have observed in similar altitudes. it's speed was slower and more of a free fall maybe terminal velocity descent.
 i believe the thing that stood out most was it's relative size. it appeared to be a very large object. i lost sight of the object as it dissappeared behind the thunder head clouds.

you can contact me by email and i will be willing to give further info face to face if need be.
content.summary: Unknown object heading to earth leaving a large vapor trail.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking on the ocean beach pier on friday march 20, 2009 at approximately 10 pm. i looked east towards the fog and saw what looked like a flare being launched into the sky and thought "oh someone is just launching fireworks or something." then it disappeared and another flare-looking object appeared elsewhere in the sky going downwards and sideways as the other flare-like object reappeared. they then started doing random and weird aerodynamics, looking like how bugs just random fly around. but they were also disappearing and reappearing at random. i pointed it out to my friends and me and my friend took out our cell phones and filmed the incident. other fishermen on the pier saw what we saw and we all did not know what it was and were quite frankly weirded out. i tried to point it out to as many people as possible. after about 5 minutes the objects disappeared. i knew it wasnt a flare, because it was flying around and i knew it wasn't a jet or anything because it was disappearing and reappearing. 
sadly the video i took on my phone was not in good enough quality to see the objects, but heres the video anyways:
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=gkratnhphym
i looked around on youtube for other ufo videos and found one video that looks exactly like what i saw. here it is":
http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=lidndoidflg

this was my first ufo sighting and definitely was a life changing experience. keep your eyes to the skies.
content.summary: 2 ufos sighted in ocean beach, ca (in san diego) on the pier looking towards the east on friday, march 20. 2009 at approximately 10:00 pm.

content.detailedDescription:
Me entere de ustedes por su programa en el discovery chanel, y queria compartir esta fotografia que paso a describir: 


la fotograf���a que les env���o fue tomada por un amigo el 23 de septiembre del 07. el practica ciclismo y es aficionado a la fotograf���a, ese d���a estaba tomando fotograf���as del puerto de tigre (buenos aires) como lo hac���a normalmente. cuando volvi��� a su casa se puso a ver las fotograf���as con un amigo de el cual le se���alo esta esfera naranja en el cielo. en el momento q el tomo la fotograf���a no hab���a notado nada extra���o en el cielo y me pidi��� a m��� que la viera ya que soy m���s reservado en el tema.

yo con mi experiencia en retoques fotogr���ficos no pude determinar que la fotograf���a haya sido retocada, adem���s conserva la marca de agua de la c���mara como podr���n ver. no creo q sea un globo ya q tiene sombra en su parte inferior y parecer���a desplazarse ya q se ve q tiene una trayectoria

si pudieran analizar la fotograf���a ustedes y decirme que es me gustar���a que me lo explicaran ya que me apasiona tanto como a ustedes investigar estos casos.

saludos
content.summary: El objeto fue visto despues de fotografiarlo.

content.detailedDescription: I was living work i clocked out at 8:52 pm i smoked half a cigarette got in my car and started to drive towards grissom but in kokomo so whatever direction that is. i noticed these 2 lights a little redder than the peach color of street lights towards my left. i assumed it was two plains in the clouds flying near each other with lights on. ahead of me and towards the right i saw a low flying re fueler with all its lights on so i would say it was about 150 ft in the air. i realized it was about same distance away from length and highest of other 2 plains and i looked back towards left at them the two lights were closer together, so still assuming they were two plains crossing i put my attention back on refulier. i often wonder how my times re fueler with lights on a mistaken for ufo's there so bright and look strange with all lights on thats why it was holding my attention. i looked back at reddish lights and noticed they were gone and figured they had passed and turned off lights. i was coming towards a 4 way stop and slowing down by this time. i then saw the reddish lights blink on and off 3-4 times but looked to be jumping around. then all at once like a jet dropping flairs in order 1 2 3 4 5 6 maybe 7 of these lights in a perfect line not real bright flairs that close would be but bright maybe do to clouds. i slammed on brakes and grab camera phone flipped open and was about to take picture and gone. 3 second no more were these lit up. i sat there looking for something nothing to be seen no flashing lights from jet nothing. i could see the flashing lights on refulier so i assumed on jet i would be able to see too. on the way home i was thinking maybe that it wasn't two jets passing in sky but these thing flashing lights on and off, that is unknown. what i do come to realize on way home that this thing had to be over man part of kokomo and doubt air force would drop flairs over a city, that even if they could put a 3 sec burn on flairs that they would have burned out in order they were dropped not all at once. i wish i had gotten a picture. i read another person reported this and thinks its flairs i thought it was to at first but not sure with the two things i just stated. i am sure that if there had been a jet i would have seen a flashing light on it do to fact i could see the flashing light on refuler even with all its lights on.
content.summary: String of 5-7 lights in row.

content.detailedDescription: Self and teen going west on county rd. in harrison co. saw 3 bright white ,round lights in a triangular shape up ahead.Thought it to possibly be a plane flying low,however we were actually approaching it,as if it wasn't moving much or not at all.We came up on it on shiloh rd.,pulled over in a driveways edge to get better look.As we came to a stop it hovered,for approx. 5secs. longer than began slowly moving off to the north/west of us.It was only about 3-500' in the air ,was large the size of an airplane in length but much wider.It had 3 round large white lights on ,not strobing like others in past.It made a humming/swooshing sound,but nothing like an airplane or jet would make,it actually sounded closer to the sound of those 'quieter'helicopters.It did not disturb the car mechanics or us,we did not loose any time,just had a few moments of wonder before our eyes again.
content.summary: Hovering next to road drove right under/past it!

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car driving north on old wire rd. it was 8:30 in november so it was pitch black outside. as i was driving, i happened to look up at the sky between the trees on both sides of the road. almost immediately as i looked upwards, a halogen-like, bright blue saucer flew from directly above me, traveling in the same direction as i was until it was out of sight in about a second, maybe even less. my initial reaction was, "wow that was a bizarre shooting star!" but then it sunk in, and i realized that what i had just seen was not a star but a saucer like object. it's hard for me to gauge how high up above me it was due to the brief amount of time i was able to observe it, but if i were to guess, i would say anywhere from 150-500 ft high. also, the next day, i was at a friends house and against my better judgment, i mentioned it to two of my friends, that i had seen a ufo. (knowing that even if they didn't believe me we were close enough that they wouldn't take me for a loon) to my surprise, one of my friends who i had told said that he and his girlfriend had been walking on campus that night roughly 3 miles or so from where i had seen the ufo, and that they too had seen the exact thing i had just described.
content.summary: Driving north on old wire road. happened to look up right as it flew above me also headed north.

content.detailedDescription: In washington highschool in pensacola florida a fire alarm went off with out cause causing many people to come out. now it was around 8:30 so there wasnt very many people in the school other than janitors and orchestra practice students. when every one was out side we heard emergency response vehicles coming toward us but they circled around us torward the airport which was very strange, we were sure they were coming in response to the fire alarm. we looked toward the airport and saw orange red lights that would appear for about 4 seconds and dissapear and appear to the right about 10 - 30 seconds later. it did this about two times when a helicopter over passed us extremely close to the ground for just a helicopter to be flying around. the helicopter made a l shaped turn towards the lights.The lights appeared and dissapeared about 8 times.The helicopter then went around the area we first saw the lights.Then about 2-3 min later we were facing the complete opposite direction, 180 degrees the other way and we saw the lights appear and reappear about twice and stopped for the rest of the night. pretty soon after words there was about 3-5 helicopters flying around all of the areas we had just sighted the flying dots. this was all in pensacola florida.Right after the fire alarm went off, we heard a loud bass sound for about 30 second to a minute. after the dots dissapeared a large cloud seemed to cover that area.
content.summary: Red-orange floating dots.

content.detailedDescription:
Just over cordova mall near the pensacola airport, about four or five red lights appeared in the night sky after a fire alarm went off at washington high school.  several people exited the building and noticed the lights in the sky.

shortly after, several helicopters and emergency sirens could be heard in the area, but not sure if they were responding to the lights.

the lights faded out, then reappear in random locations in the sky several (more than five) times.

my son caught it on his phone camera, so it's kind of hard to see.  at about the middle of the video you can make out a light at the center of the screen.  they were joking about what they thought they might be seeing, but then quickly got excited and nervous at the thought that it really could be a ufo.  the ringing noise on the video is the fire alarm from the school, but the kids say that they heard a low pitch noise--a "boom"--that continued to hum for about a minute after.

we contacted local media and authorities, but no one seems to be able to explain it.
content.summary: Red lights in the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: My brother and i were riding in the car and we saw what looked like very low flying planes, until it disappeared and reappeared. there were 5 lights that would fade and disappear and then reappear and stay lit for about 5 seconds and disappear again. this continued on and we tried to follow it (heading south on log lake rd. until we got to guest? lake) to find out what the lights were. we stopped at a good place to view the lights in front of a house where the residents were looking at the lights, too. the round lights were about the color of the orange-yellow of common street lamps and we decided they weren't fireworks, flares, helicopters, or airplanes. we live very close to eglin afb's and duke field's outlying land. i took my brother home (the opposite way we were following the phenomena) and when i came back to jump on the interstate (i-10), there were several emergency response teams coming from that way. i couldn't make out what types of response vehicles they were, though. it's a super rural area, so there's nothing back there for 6 or 7 such vehicles to come from. there was no sound with this...Happening. bizarre!
content.summary: Thought they were fireworks!

content.detailedDescription:
I saw orange lights to west that have been seeing for last 3-4 years,  i seem to be able to sense when these things are going to occur now,  primarily due to the presence of several things:  loud, but high altitude aircraft barely visible due to altitude and small blinking lights,  dogs barking all around,  (sounds they hear?)  and partial cloudy skies, not totally obliterated low ceiling clouds as typical march indiana skies.  anyway,  at 8:54 saw 3 episodes, very close together, within one minute of start of orange amber "flares" that seemed to be strung together.  this time much further in distance than i have seen before,  no noise, was able to get my son to witness...(he's not that excited by it)  lights were motionless in sky after appearing but stayed lit for about 4 seconds.  i dont get too excited about them now as i do believe these are military flares occuring at a place called "hilltop" airspace near grissom afb between peru and kokomo but west of us 31. i am guessing asa an inexperienced/untrained observater, that these are about 5 miles west of 31.   do not understand why fort wayne national guard unit who flies f-16 aircraft, in this airspace, do not let civilian population be aware of the manuevers as they are alarming to witness at first.  you do not know if you are witnessing an aircraft accident or whatever.  it caused a big stir last year in kokomo due to a sonic boom that occured in syncronism with the sighting of the "flares" which i saw that same eveing as well as hearing the boom; same thing then,i went out expecting to see something and was not let down.  dont know how or why i can sense these dam things are going to start showing up.  always seems to be around 9- 9:30 pm at least prior to daylite savings time.  
additionally, the only other thing that disturbs me is that experience pilots who have posted on this website, claim to have never seen such lights, so what gives? top secret manuevers and "flares" over central indianan with out so much as a "heads-up" to the local newppaper/press/radio stations?  or are they just having fun with us?
content.summary: Same orange lights saw for last 3 -4 years west of my location. i did see high altitude aircraft and now believe these are some new kind of flares occuring @ "hilltop" airspace near grissom afb, same as those that caused stir last year after sonic boom.

content.detailedDescription:
While riding in windrock atv park ( http://www.Windrockatv.Com ), my girlfriend and i was on top of a good size mountian enjoying the view, so she decided to take a few pictures. when we loaded the pictures on my computer to view them, it was the first thing i noticed in the picture!! neither of us seen it until we actually looked at the pictures! 

the even occured on 3-21-09 around 4:17pm eastern time.

the first picture is the original picture, and is still on my camera

the other two i have magnified a small portion and then inverted the colors on the last picture using windows paint (thats all i have) or know how to use.

also!!! while looking through my recent atv pictures of previous rides on 6/28/08 i have another great set of photos, something that i had never caught earlier. there seems to be another one in one of my photos, one that did not show up in the next photo taken; no more than 10 seconds later.
content.summary: It was the first picture taken of the day!!

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back porch, which faces east, at my home on nine mile road and ashland rd. in pensacola, fl.  a navy base and a regional airport are located near my home.   airline and helicopter traffic at night is common in the eastern pensacola sky. 

at approx 8:30pm 
a "spiral", for lack of better term, of lights began glowing a very bright red-orange in the east sky. this was not a helicopter or plane.  it would glow for approx 1 - 4 sec then fade out from tail to the center of the "spiral".  
i called into the house for my wife to come out and see, which she did. 
the event lasted for approx 3 mins. with 10 - 30 secs in between appearances of the "spiral" in different configurations and also bouncing left and right in the sky from one appearance to another.
content.summary: Spiral of lights glowing at 1-3 sec durations with lights brightening and dimmming from tail to center.
